program.title: Program information
program.description: Information required to run the program

binary.title: Program binary
binary.description: The entry point for an executable

args.title: Program arguments
args.description: The arguments to provide to an executable

env.title: Environment variables
env.description: Environment variables to provide to an executable

use.title: Used capabilities
use.description: Capabilities that will be installed in this component's namespace

service.title: Used service source path
service.description: The path under which a service is offered to this component

directory.title: Used directory source path
directory.description: The path under which a directory is offered to this component

as.title: Used capability target path
as.description: The path to which the capability will be installed in the component's incoming namespace. Defaults to "service"/"directory".

expose.title: Capabilities exposed
expose.description: Capabilities exposed by this component to its containing realm

service.title: Exposed service source path
service.description: The path to the service being exposed. This is either a path in this component's outgoing namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the service was exposed by the child (if from "#$CHILD").

directory.title: Exposed directory source path
directory.description: The path to the directory being exposed. This is either a path in this component's outgoing namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the directory was exposed by the child (if from "#$CHILD").

from.title: Exposed capability source component
from.description: The component which has the capability to expose. Either "self" or "#$CHILD".

as.title: Exposed capability target path
as.description: The path under which the capability will be exposed. Defaults to "service"/"directory"

offer.title: Offered capabilitys
offer.description: Capabilities offered by this component to its children

service.title: Offered service source path
service.description: The path to the service being offered. This is either a path in this component's namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the service was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

directory.title: Offered directory source path
directory.description: The path to the directory being offered. This is either a path in this component's outgoing namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the directory was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

from.title: Offered capability source component
from.description: The component which has the capability to offer. Either "realm", "self" or "#$CHILD".

targets.title: Offered capability targets
targets.description: The components the capability is being offered to

to.title: Offered capability target component
to.description: The child component to which the capability is being offered, with the syntax "#$CHILD".

as.title: Offered capability target path
as.description: The path by which the capability will be offered. The path is either a path in this component's namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the capability was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

children.title: Child components
children.description: The children of this component, including name and launch information

name.title: Child component name
name.description: The parent's local name for the child

uri.title: Child component URI
uri.description: The URI that identifies the child component.
